General.Name: Zhewen Pictures Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhewen Pictures Group co.,ltd produces and sells yarns in China. The company offers worsted, semi-worsted, fancy, slubbed, and other knitted yarns; and worsted fabrics. It provides its products under the SINFONIA, ARMONIA, REGAL, LANIFICIO LA MALPENGA, and PALLADIO brand names. In addition, the company engages in the hotel, film and television, and sewage treatment businesses. Zhewen Pictures Group co.,ltd was founded in 1993 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

3.Name: Mr. Guodong  Zou
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
